title: As soon as the development / building permission is obtained, the owner / developer shall install "D
clause_text: As soon as the development / building permission is obtained, the owner / developer shall install "Display Board" on conspicuous place on site indicating following details :- Name and address of owner, developer, all concerned licensed persons; Survey number / city survey number of land under reference;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
